definition: European Organization for Nuclear Research CERN, at Geneva
pinyin: Ou1 zhou1 He2 zi3 Yan2 jiu1 Zhong1 xin1

definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: CERN, said anti-matter as a "mirror of the universe."
sentences.chinese: 歐洲核子研究中心稱，反物質就像是“宇宙的鏡子”。
